title: Omniauth and dynamic route segments: proposed solution doesn't work
body:
I am currently upgrading from Devise 3.1 to Devise 3.5.1 and getting next error:

```
Devise does not support scoping OmniAuth callbacks under a dynamic segment (RuntimeError)
and you have set "/:locale/users". You can work around by passing
`skip: :omniauth_callbacks` and manually defining the routes. Here is an example:

    match "/users/auth/:provider",
      constraints: { provider: /google|facebook/ },
      to: "devise/omniauth_callbacks#passthru",
      as: :omniauth_authorize,
      via: [:get, :post]

    match "/users/auth/:action/callback",
      constraints: { action: /google|facebook/ },
      to: "devise/omniauth_callbacks#:action",
      as: :omniauth_callback,
      via: [:get, :post]
```

But solution proposed in error message isn't working for me.

What I'm trying:

``` ruby
devise_scope :user do
  providers_regexp = Regexp.new(User.omniauth_providers.join('|'))
  match '/users/auth/:provider',
        constraints: { provider: providers_regexp },
        to: 'users/omniauth_callbacks#passthru',
        as: :user_omniauth_authorize,
        via: [:get, :post]

  match '/users/auth/:action/callback',
        constraints: { action: providers_regexp },
        to: "users/omniauth_callbacks##{providers_regexp}",
        as: :user_omniauth_callback,
        via: [:get, :post]
end

scope '/:locale', locale: Regexp.new(I18n.available_locales.join('|')) do
  devise_for :users, skip: :omniauth_callbacks
end
```

I'm getting next error when trying to authenticate using any provider:

```
Not found. Authentication passthru.
```

What IS working for me is the @rafaltrojanowski solution (thanks!) from discussion in #2227

``` ruby
devise_for :users, only: :omniauth_callbacks, controllers: {omniauth_callbacks: 'users/omniauth_callbacks'}

scope '/:locale', locale: Regexp.new(I18n.available_locales.join('|')) do
  devise_for :users, skip: :omniauth_callbacks
end
```

I think that error message should be changed including some working solution.
